Hi!

I am a PhD student in Operations Research at Georgia Tech.

Before this, I graduated from IIT Kharagpur, with a B.Tech in Industrial and Systems Engineering. My B. tech thesis in Supply Chain Modelling was supervised my Prof. M. K. Tiwari. Next, I worked as an Operations Research consultant at TCG Digital.

Currently, I am working on UPS sponsored project under the guidance of Prof. M. Savelsbergh, Prof. N. Boland, and Prof. A. Erera on solving complex problems that arise in large scale service network design.

News

[Sep 2019] Working as a GRA under M. Savelsbergh, N. Boland, A. Erera on UPS project, Atlanta
[Aug 2019] Beginning my PhD in Operations Research at Georgia Tech, Atlanta
[July 2019] Wrapped up my internship with Space Optimization team at The Home Depot , Atlanta
[May 2019] Started internship at The Home Depot, Atlanta
